trans-unit.resname: MIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Name
MIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 鸠集～在你回合的战斗开始时，在至多一个目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果你操控三个或更多力量各不相同的生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Name
MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的灵俑死去时，若它不具败朽，则派出一个2/2黑色，具败朽异能的灵俑衍生生物。（它不能进行阻挡。当它攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个灵俑。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·3 | Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth | Card Name
MIC·3 | Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，探查。（派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: MIC·3 | Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a token, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个衍生物时，刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MIC·4 | Kyler, Sigardian Emissary | Card Name
MIC·4 | Kyler, Sigardian Emissary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个人类在你的操控下进战场时，在席嘉妲密使凯勒尔上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·4 | Kyler, Sigardian Emissary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other Humans you control get +1/+1 for each counter on Kyler.
trans-unit.target: 凯勒尔上每有一个指示物，由你操控的其他人类便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·5 | Celestial Judgment | Card Name
MIC·5 | Celestial Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each different power among creatures on the battlefield, choose a creature with that power. Destroy each creature not chosen this way.
trans-unit.target: 为战场上生物中每种不同的力量值各选择一个力量为该值的生物。消灭所有未以此法选择的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·6 | Curse of Conformity | Card Name
MIC·6 | Curse of Conformity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·6 | Curse of Conformity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Nonlegendary creatures enchanted player controls have base power and toughness 3/3 and lose all creature types.
trans-unit.target: 由所结附的牌手操控之非传奇生物的基础力量与防御力为3/3，且失去所有生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·7 | Moorland Rescuer | Card Name
MIC·7 | Moorland Rescuer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return any number of other creature cards with total power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is CARDNAME's power. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当荒野救援军死去时，将任意数量的其他生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且这些牌的力量总和须等于或小于X，X为荒野救援军的力量。放逐荒野救援军。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·8 | Sigarda's Vanguard | Card Name
MIC·8 | Sigarda's Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·8 | Sigarda's Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
MIC·8 | Sigarda's Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当席嘉妲的先锋进战场或攻击时，选择任意数量力量各不相同的生物。这些生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·9 | Stalwart Pathlighter | Card Name
MIC·9 | Stalwart Pathlighter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·9 | Stalwart Pathlighter | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 鸠集～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控三个或更多力量各不相同的生物，则由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·10 | Wall of Mourning | Card Name
MIC·10 | Wall of Mourning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·10 | Wall of Mourning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile a card from the top of your library face down for each opponent you have.
trans-unit.target: 当悲恸之墙进战场时，你每有一位对手，便从你的牌库顶牌面朝下地放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·10 | Wall of Mourning | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Coven — At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, put a card exiled with CARDNAME into its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 鸠集～在你的结束步骤开始时，若你操控三个或更多力量各不相同的生物，则将一张以悲恸之墙放逐的牌置于其拥有者手上。

MIC·11 | Cleaver Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}，牺牲另一个灵俑：派出两个衍生物，这些衍生物为所牺牲生物的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·12 | Curse of Unbinding | Card Name
MIC·12 | Curse of Unbinding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·12 | Curse of Unbinding | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. That player puts the rest of the revealed cards into their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 在所结附的牌手之维持开始时，该牌手从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。该牌手将其余展示的牌置入其坟墓场。

MIC·13 | Drown in Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: MIC·13 | Drown in Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 2
MIC·13 | Drown in Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: MIC·14 | Empty the Laboratory | Card Name
MIC·14 | Empty the Laboratory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice X Zombies, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a number of Zombie creature cards equal to the number of Zombies sacrificed this way. Put those cards onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲X个灵俑，然后从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出若干灵俑生物牌为止，其数量等同于以此法牺牲的灵俑数量。将这些牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

MIC·15 | Hordewing Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MIC·15 | Hordewing Skaab | Card Text | Paragraph 3

MIC·16 | Shadow Kin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIC·16 | Shadow Kin | Card Text | Paragraph 2

They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types and they gain decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

MIC·20 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Text | Paragraph 1

MID·317 | Dennick, Pious Apparition | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards are put into graveyards from anywhere, investigate. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌从任何区域进入坟墓场时，探查。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: MID·317 | Dennick, Pious Apparition | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果虔敬新魂丹尼克将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MID·318 | Florian, Voldaren Scion | Card Name
MID·318 | Florian, Voldaren Scion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MID·318 | Florian, Voldaren Scion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the total amount of life your opponents lost this turn. Exile one of those cards and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled card this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你战斗后的行动阶段开始时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为本回合中对手失去的生命总数量。放逐其中一张，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。本回合中，你可以使用所放逐的牌。

MID·319 | Liesa, Forgotten Archangel | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MID·319 | Liesa, Forgotten Archangel | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由对手操控的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: As this creature transforms into CARDNAME, it becomes a copy of a creature card exiled with it, except its name is CARDNAME, it's 4/4, and it's a legendary blue and black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Olag equal to the number of creature cards exiled with it.
trans-unit.target: 于此生物转化为卢德维巨作欧拉格时，它成为一张以其放逐之生物牌的复制品，但其名称是卢德维巨作欧拉格，为4/4，额外是蓝黑双色的传奇灵俑，且仍具有原本颜色与类别。在欧拉格上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于以其放逐的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your graveyard, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: MID·321 | Old Stickfingers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
